Presenting Problem / Chief Complaint: The patient expresses a desire to manage stress better and seeks coping strategies
History of Present Illness (HPI): The patient shares positive communication with their wife about feelings, noting it brought them closer. They acknowledge some setbacks in their health journey due to work stress, leading to guilt over missed workouts and unhealthy eating. However, they also highlight joyful moments spent with family, which enhance their sense of connection
Mental Health Observations: The patient reports feeling relaxed and connected during mindfulness exercises
Therapeutic Interventions: The session included mindfulness exercises focusing on grounding techniques to help manage stress
Next Steps: The patient plans to be kinder to themselves during setbacks and to involve their children in cooking to create a positive environment
